resources.string: The app is using your current location

1.Generate QRCodes for shops and public vehicle\'s by entering the details in the form.\n2.Take Screenshot and print it.\n3.Take the print out and paste it infront of shop\'s or vehicle\'s where it is visible for people to scan it.

Working:
 As user scan's a qrcode infront of shop's or vehicle
1.Time,Day of scanning and Address of the shop will be updated to cloud.
2.Incase of vehicle's licence number will be updated to cloud
Location history of places you have travelled
History of shop/vehicle\'s you have travelled

NO CONTENT

Goto to Location in the MainActivity
and turn on location service
to see your location history
NO CONTENT\n\nScan QRCodes to see history
